page.title: 14Change,1920_39,Fauldhouse
page.content: {Housing Miners Rows {____________________ Consisted of one small kitchen,a small sink ,one room with set in beds and an outside toilet. {Schooling {_________ Classes : About 40 per class. Subjects:Mathematics,History,English, Religious , Geography , Cooking and Woodwork . Books and jotters were provided at school.Leaving age was 14 exemption 13 .Punishment by cane or kept in after hours.{ {Work In Area {____________ Men:Coal mining.Women: Had to go to town to work in rich men's houses.The work they did was domestic . Meaning cleaning floors, tidying houses. They got very little pay.
